SELECT P.*, if(C.CNT IS NULL,0,C.CNT) CNT FROM category P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CATE_PARENT_IDX,COUNT(CATE_PARENT_IDX) CNT FROM category where CATE_PARENT_IDX is not null GROUP BY CATE_PARENT_IDX ) C ON P.CATE_IDX = C.CATE_PARENT_IDX WHERE P.CATE_PARENT_IDX = #{CATE_PARENT_IDX} GROUP BY CATE_IDX order by CATE_ORDER
